committees.committee: House Banking, Finance, and Urban Affairs
House Banking, Finance, and Urban Affairs

official_title: A bill to amend the Federal Reserve Act to control the growth of the money supply and promote stable prices, reasonable interest rates, and maximum employment.
short_title: Money Supply and Inflation Control Act

summary.text: Money Supply and Inflation Control Act - Amends the Federal Reserve Act to require that the time, character, and volume of all purchases and sales of paper eligible for open-market operations be governed with a view to reducing inflation and preventing recession by establishing the growth of the money supply as specified by this Act.

titles.title: Money Supply and Inflation Control Act
A bill to amend the Federal Reserve Act to control the growth of the money supply and promote stable prices, reasonable interest rates, and maximum employment.
